name: Testing

on:
  push:
    branches: [ master ]

jobs:
  test:
    name: test
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2 # cloning current repo into docker-container

      - name: Set up Go
        uses: actions/setup-go@v2
        with:
          go-version: 1.17

      - name: Install Taskfile
        uses: arduino/setup-task@v1

      - name: Test account service
        run: cd account && task unit-v

      - name: Upload coverage to Codecov (demo)
        uses: ./
        with:
          files: ./account/coverage.txt,./coverage.txt
          file: ./account/coverage.txt
          name: codecov-demo

# остановился тут - добавить Codecov после тестов - загружать эти файлы в сервис
# можн см пример тут https://github.com/codecov/codecov-action
